name: Pollux
description: The coolest of all time, you always like to be stylish. You don't care what other people think of you. You just want to do what makes you happy. What matters most at the end of the day is having fun. Inspired by cars, Pollux was created for easy socializing with others. It will bring an element of joy through its vibrant colours to your everyday life. With this unique silhouette, you will fit in well at any event.
